vulnerability.name: USN-4126-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4126-1 fixed a vulnerability in FreeType. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  It was discovered that FreeType incorrectly handled certain font files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information. (CVE-2015-9381, CVE-2015-9382)  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that FreeType incorrectly handled certain font files.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information.  (CVE-2015-9383)

statements.status_notes: FreeType could be made to expose sensitive information if it opened a specially crafted font file. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
